mapper.insert: insert into tool(id, name, description, link, avatar, tool_type_id, create_time, creator_id, color) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{link}, #{avatar}, #{toolTypeId}, #{createTime}, #{creatorId}, #{color})
mapper.select:
select t.*, creator.name as creatorName, tt.name as toolTypeName from tool t left join user as creator on creator.id = t.creator_id left join tool_type as tt on tt.id = t.tool_type_id
and t.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') and t.tool_type_id = #{toolTypeId}
